attributes.additional_details: Give us a fair wage , even a living wage instead of a minimum wage
attributes.background: Care workers are mostly on minimum wage, not even living wage . We work long hours , some doing the work of nurses , we worked all threw the pandemic & have always been on a low wage .

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about pay for care workers are a matter for their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
